::DarkMouse::

"Probably a few hours.  Terrorsaur looks like a strong flyer.  He'll 
make it by nighfall most likely."




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@h...> 
wrote:
> Quickstrike:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Quickstrike took the sheet of paper in between his long fingers. He 
chuckled 
> at Dark Mouse. "He never met Hell Beast. Th' only bot he ever came 
in 
> contact wit' was me." He turned and made a short whistling noise to 
> Terrorsaur's direction. He waved the red flier over to him. He 
lifted his 
> head, and flew over to him reluctantly. He transformed to robot 
mode in 
> front of him and folded his arms.
> 
> "Ah got uh job fer ya," Quickstrike said. "Ah want ya t' go t' 
these 
> coordinates and find uh bot named Rowdy Wolf. He's uh big dang bot 
wit' furs 
> all over 'im. Ya can't miss 'im." He handed Terrorsaur the paper 
with the 
> coordinates. "Ya might find 'im by his cave. It's north of th' last 
marker, 
> past uh dead long tree. There's uh whole bunch of rocks, hills and 
boulders 
> near there. But keep yer eye out on 'im. He'll shoot ya." 
Terrorsaur's brows 
> lowered on him. "Jus' say ya know me an' we need him here, then 
you'll be 
> fine."
> 
> Quickstrike nodded his head to the side and waved him off.
> 
> Terrorsaur studied the coordinates for a moment. He gave a glance 
at him. He 
> had a feeling the flier knew it was a long trip. He watched as the 
flier 
> took off.
> 
> Quickstrike turned his body back to Dark Mouse. "How long do you 
think uh 
> trip like that might take uh flier? Two days? It took me four days 
fer me t' 
> get back from there."
>
